thread.title: Military arrests ex-Burkina Faso minister
thread.title_full: Military arrests ex-Burkina Faso minister | News24

author: news24.com
title: Military arrests ex-Burkina Faso minister
text:
Ouagadougou - Burkina Faso's army says it has arrested a former high-ranking minister who served under the country's now-ousted president of nearly 30 years.
Former Foreign Affairs Minister Djibril Bassole denies the allegations that he supported the military general behind this month's failed coup.
The government accuses Bassole of joining forces with General Gilbert Diendere and alleges the two have sought help from foreign forces.
Bassole replied late on Monday by calling it a "demonisation campaign" against him.
